CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 2a Here we report another novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer ( PBDT-TDPP-S ) for highperformance PSCs , in which the BDT and thiophene units are conjugatedly formed the main chain and the di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione ( TDPP ) units are pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain by a linkage of a 2-vinylthiophenyl unit.

Let's think step by step.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the copolymer reported in the paragraph.
2. PBDT: This stands for Poly(benzodithiophene), which is a part of the main chain of the copolymer.
3. BDT units: These are the benzodithiophene units that form part of the main chain.
4. Thiophene units: These are the thiophene units that also form part of the main chain.
5. TDPP units: This stands for di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione. These are the units that make up the side chain.
6. 2-vinylthiophenyl unit: This is the linkage that connects the TDPP units to the thiophenyl units in the side chain.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the copolymer.
2. TDPP units: This stands for di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione. These are the units that make up the side chain.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 2a Here we report another novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer ( PBDT-TDPP-S ) for highperformance PSCs , in which the BDT and thiophene units are conjugatedly formed the main chain and the di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione ( TDPP ) units are pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain by a linkage of a 2-vinylthiophenyl unit.

Let's think step by step.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer reported in the paragraph.
2. PBDT: This stands for a part of the copolymer's name, likely representing the part of the main chain that is formed by the BDT units.
3. BDT units: These are the units in the copolymer's main chain that are formed by the BDT compound.
4. Thiophene units: These are the units in the copolymer's main chain that are formed by the thiophene compound.
5. TDPP units: These are the units that make up the side chain of the copolymer, specifically the di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione compound.
6. 2-vinylthiophenyl unit: This is the linkage that connects the TDPP units to the thiophenyl units in the copolymer's side chain.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the novel copolymer reported for high-performance PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells).
2. TDPP units: These are the units that make up the side chain of the copolymer and may have an impact on the material's properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 2a Here we report another novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer ( PBDT-TDPP-S ) for highperformance PSCs , in which the BDT and thiophene units are conjugatedly formed the main chain and the di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione ( TDPP ) units are pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain by a linkage of a 2-vinylthiophenyl unit.

Let's think step by step.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer that is being reported. It can be considered as a single Property Value entity.
2. BDT units: These are the benzothiadiazole units that form part of the main chain of the copolymer.
3. Thiophene units: These are the thiophene units that also form part of the main chain of the copolymer.
4. TDPP units: These are the di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione units that are pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain.
5. 2-vinylthiophenyl unit: This is the linkage that connects the TDPP units to the thiophenyl units in the side chain.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the copolymer with the reported high-performance for PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells).
2. TDPP units: These are the side chain units that contribute to the material property of the copolymer in PSCs.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S: a novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer for high-performance PSCs |
| TDPP units: di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione units that are pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain |
